surveyproformat_label.content:
INTEGER

This plugin, like all the others provided by surveypro core, is equipped with a set of common settings shared with all the other surveypro elements.

The common settings set is done by:

  1. Required
  2. Indent
  3. Question position
  4. Element number
  5. Variable
  6. Additional note

This plugin is equipped with only one integer specific setting:

  1. Default

and with two more validation options:

  1. Lower bound
  2. Upper bound

The cartesian product of all these settings makes a very long list of possible implementations of this element. In this usertemplate few use cases are described.

• mandatory
  • input is lower limited to 1
  • input is upper limited to at least 19
  • the default invites the user to choose a value.
Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to a not valid value so the user is forced to choose a different value or select the "No answer" item.

surveyprofield_integer.content: How many children do your parents have?

surveyproformat_label.content:
• mandatory
  • input is lower limited to 1
  • input is upper limited to at least 19
  • the default is set to 1 (to count the person filling the survey)
Behaviour: The item is mandatory and the default is set to a not valid value so the user is forced to choose a different value or select the "No answer" item.

surveyprofield_integer.content: How many children do your parents have?

surveyproformat_label.content:
• not mandatory (so: "No answer" is expected)
  • input is lower limited to 1
  • input is upper limited to 19
  • the default is set to 1 (to count the person filling the survey)
Behaviour: The item is not mandatory and the default is set to a valid value so the user can "fly" over this item leaving the proposed default untouched (and the question not read) or select the "No answer" item.

surveyprofield_integer.content: How many children do your parents have?

surveyproformat_label.content:
• not mandatory (so: "No answer" is expected)
  • input is lower limited to 1
  • input is limited to at least 19
  • the default invites the user to choose a value.
Behaviour: The item is not mandatory and the default is set to a not valid value so the user is forced to choose a different date or tick the "No answer" checkbox.

surveyprofield_integer.content: How many children do your parents have?
